author.name: Ashsih Rijal
author.about:
I am a seasoned and passionate software engineer with over 10 years of experience developing robust, scalable, and efficient software solutions for various industries.My expertise has enabled me to make a meaningful impact in multiple domains, from e-commerce and logistics to education, retail management, healthcare, and finance.

In addition to my technical skills, I possess excellent problem-solving abilities, strong communication skills, and a collaborative mindset. As a team lead and senior engineer, I have successfully guided teams of developers to deliver projects on time, within budget, and with exceptional quality.
author.background: My professional background is rooted in software development, with experience working on various projects, including restaurant management systems, freight forwarding services, and multi-store systems. As a Sr Software Engineer Team Lead, I coordinated cross-functional teams, implemented scrum methodologies, and created architectures for projects. My proficiency in .NET 6, React, Next JS, ReactNative, Angular, and C# ensures that I can work efficiently with a variety of technologies. Throughout my career, I've developed a broad range of skills that enable me to tackle complex problems, from software design patterns to architecture and web development.
strengths: Experience with ASP.NET MVC,React, Angular,Unity, React Native, and WPF
Proven track record of delivering high-quality software solutions on time
